name: Civil/Structural/Architectural Lead Engineer
description:
Обязанности:
  • Participate in reviews and formulation of technical solutions for the Client in part of Civil (incl. Plot Plan), Structural, Architectural design
  • Provide inputs to the Design Basis, Scope of Work, Initial Data, Kick-off Meeting
  • Assist clients towards feasible options and manage expectations
  • EPFCM, EPC Pre-contract activities, ITB, preparing estimates and price comparisons (PDP, FEED, PD, Detail engineering Subcontractors)
  • Formulate, check-up and analyze capital expenditures and project designs
  • Schedule and coordinate CSA discipline work to deadlines and within financial budgets
  • Prepare project timely reporting to project management: follow-up the activity, critical deviations of activities and/or potential risks
  • Contribute to get Client’s approval of technical documents
  • Check and monitor Issue quality within the project
  • Develop and check structural calculations of buildings, piperacks, underground facilities as per Western and Russian codes
  • Develop and check calculations and design for foundations (piles, footings, slabs, etc.)
  • Review and provide technical evaluation of vendor's and sub-contractor’s proposals for materials, equipment and services
  • Coordinate and develop 3D Models for CSA scope
  • Participate in 3D model, Constructability, Operability reviews
Требования:
  • Master Degree in Civil/Structural Engineering
  • At least 5 years of relevant experience in Oil&Gas, Petrochemical industry.
  • Sound experience in structural calculations, including calculation of steel connection details, concrete reinforcement
  • Experience in foundation design - shallow foundations, piles, slabs on ground
  • Experience in interaction with material/equipment suppliers and engineering sub-contractors
  • Knowledge of AVEVA E3D, LIRA (or similar structural calculation software)
  • Good English speaking skills (Upper-Intermediate).
Условия:
  • Оформление по ТК РФ
  • Белая ЗП
